‚ô¶ A first-person gameplay with lots of surprises to make your experience fun and exciting üåü
‚ô¶ Complete achievements to get numerous rewards üéÅ
‚ô¶ Follow the main story to return your grandfather‚Äôs cinema back to its glory days ‚ú®
‚ô¶ Do side quests and get to know with the town citizenüéâ
‚ô¶ It‚Äôs an offline game, so you don‚Äôt need an internet connection to play üëè

item.title: Farmer Survivors
item.description:
About This Game


Explore rural life in a completely new way with Farmer Survivors, an exciting Arcade Survivor game that puts you in the shoes of a brave farmer facing a bug infestation on their farm. Get ready for a gaming experience filled with challenges, skills, and plenty of action!

Farmer Survivors is an arcade survival game where you must withstand endless waves of insects hungry for your harvest. How long can you endure?

Automatic Targeting:

Don't worry about aiming; the game's automatic targeting system automatically focuses on the nearest enemy, allowing you to concentrate on survival strategies.

Rising Challenge:

The waves of insects become increasingly stronger and numerous, testing your skills and resilience at every moment. There are 4 seasons you can unlock as you progress through the waves!

Farm Environment:

The farm is the perfect setting for the epic battle that unfolds. Immerse yourself in rural life as you defend your precious crops. Face a variety of enemies, all based on typical farm insects. Some of them even launch projectiles, keeping you on your toes!

Strategic Choices:

At the end of each wave, you'll have the opportunity to choose items that can aid you on your journey. Make wise choices as they may be the key to your survival! Unlock and upgrade a wide range of abilities with unique effects to aid in your fight against the insects.

Weapon Diversity:

Choose from a variety of weapons, each with unique passives, and discover which suits your playstyle best. Each game is unique, thanks to randomness in the distribution of items and abilities. You never know what surprises the farm holds for you!



Get ready for an epic battle for survival in the countryside with Farmer Survivors. Put your skills to the test, make strategic decisions, and defend your farm against the invasion of hungry insects. Are you ready to be the rural hero the farm needs?

item.title: Per Aspera Test
item.description:
About This Game

Curious to find out just how fast your mind works in a life-or-death situation?
Welcome to the Per Aspera Test ‚Äì a scary game that looks like those old PlayStation 1 games. Picture this: an intense 5-minute challenge, you against the unknown, racing to survive. Can you make split-second decisions and find your way out? Time to put your skills to the test! And hey, if you manage to escape, we've got some results waiting for you at the end!


WHAT TO EXPECT
Run for Your Life:
Imagine you're in a movie, and you have to run away from scary stuff. That's what this game feels like. Run, make decisions fast, and try not to get too scared!

Old-School Design:
It's like going back to the old days of video games. The graphics are pixelated, just like the games on the first PlayStation. It's familiar but also kind of spooky.

Stressful Challenges:
We added some annoying and scary things on purpose to make it extra tough. Can you handle the stress and still be a quick thinker?

Attention: Consideration for Visual Sensitivity
Please be cautious: if you're sensitive to bright lights, this may not be the right fit for you. Our aim is for everyone to enjoy the game without feeling uneasy. Your comfort is important to us.

HOW TO PLAY
Run, breathe, and think fast to survive. It's not easy, but it's super fun. When you're done, we'll tell you how quick you were. Share with your friends and see who's the best!

item.title: CANDLES
item.description:
About This Game

DON'T GET CAUGHT


The demon goes hunting and will chase you, getting progressively more difficult as the game goes on. Use a combination of sprinting, walking, and resting to escape it.

DISCOVER


Uncover helpful hints and character memories through notes and playable flashbacks.

SEAL IT AWAY


Use your collected candles to perform a ritual and seal the demon away to survive.

AUDIO AND SOUND

CANDLES has a carefully crafted original soundtrack with an emphasis on silence and tension. All sound effects in the game are original and compose a rich and unique sound palette to enhance the experience.

item.title: A War of a Madman's Making
item.description:
About This Game

This is A War of a Madman's Making: A combination of Visual Novel and text-based RPG centered around war planning and political survival, inspired by games like Suzerain and Decisive Campaigns: Barbarossa.

War of a Madman's Making is set in a fictional world where nuclear escalation has blackened the skies. You are a citizen who has been mysteriously called up to serve as Field Marshal of the Great Leader's army. Through a combination of resource management, political maneuvering, and strategic military planning, you must survive the impending war - and the purges and assassinations that will come along with it.

You have the freedom to be ruthless in your methods, but doing so too freely could have consequences - particularly if you face a tribunal for crimes against humanity. However, mismanage your resources pursuing nobler causes, and you'll find a similar fate at the hands of your beloved Great Leader.

Rein in the disaster, protect your family, and survive the purges.

Features
  • ~70k word story with 5 major endings.
  • Resource management. Maintain a military budget, popularity with the Leader's cabinet, and favor with the Great Leader himself.
  • Choose your allies and enemies. Scheme amongst the Leader's staff or even against the Leader himself.
  • Manipulate your reports when you must give bad news to the Great Leader, but be careful not to push your luck.
  • Retro-style soundtrack by Borealis (Shirli Ainsworth) full of tense overtures and bombastic battle themes.
  • An encyclopaedia filled with lore and character details - including nuggets that an astute player will find useful.

Join the Discord and contribute to game development! https://discord.gg/XxYtYqYVwx

item.title: WWE 2K24
item.description:
About This Game

FORTY YEARS OF WRESTLEMANIA

WrestleMania is the biggest event in sports entertainment, where Superstars become WWE Legends. Experience a gripping retelling of WrestleMania‚Äôs greatest moments in 2K Showcase of the Immortals, where you can relive a collection of some of the most unforgettable, career-defining matches.

AN ICONIC ROSTER

WWE 2K24 boasts a star-studded roster featuring WWE Legends like ‚ÄúStone Cold‚Äù Steve Austin, Undertaker, and Andre the Giant, alongside current WWE Superstars like ‚ÄúThe American Nightmare‚Äù Cody Rhodes, John Cena, Rhea Ripley, and Roman Reigns, whose larger-than-life entrances and signature moves are heightened by ultra-realistic graphics.

NEW MATCH TYPES

From Guest Referee to Casket, Gauntlet, and Ambulance matches, there are a bevy of new match types to experience in WWE 2K24, including support for multiple Superstars in Backstage Brawl.

PROVE YOURSELF IN MyRISE

Unleash your raw talent and become the undisputed champ in MyRISE, featuring two thrilling career arcs and original storylines chronicling your ascent to WWE stardom from the men's and women‚Äôs divisions.

BUILD YOUR FACTION

Assemble your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends in MyFACTION. Acquire cards, build a dominant faction, compete in online multiplayer and the all-new ranked quickplay. Plus, earn exciting promotional and final rank rewards as you climb the new seasonal leaderboard!

CONTROL THE WWE UNIVERSE

Develop feuds, weekly shows, and more in Universe mode, WWE 2K24‚Äôs ultimate sandbox, with expanded rivalry actions, all-new cutscenes, and support for double-title matches!

CALL THE SHOTS IN MyGM

Oversee the biggest brands and Superstars in sports entertainment as you challenge rival general managers for the top spot in MyGM. Explore more match types, more brands, and new general managers. Trade Superstars between brands, make executive decisions on contracts, and amp up the drama.

**Online play including MyFACTION requires an internet connection and 2K Account. Terms apply.

item.title: Auto Auto: Maximum Autodrive In The Alien Apocalypse
item.description:
About This Game

Do you like survivor-style games? How about hard arcade action? Have you ever wondered what would happen if a survivor-style game had a baby with old-school carnage in a fast, action based shooter full of twisted metal and brain dead hordes?

If the answer is yes, well then... get in and buckle up! The answer to "Are we alone?" has been answered, the aliens have finally landed, and it is the Alien Apocalypse. The little green men have cranked up their mind control to 11 and taken over humanity, save one! Everyone is out for the blood of the last would-be heroine!

Who is our hapless heroine? Who could possibly resist the numbing mind control that fell humanity in the Alien Apocalypse? What gallant and noble heroine could rise from the best of the best humanity had to offer? Who, you ask? It is the clinically insane, morally flexible, car-loving protagonist with an insatiable appetite for death, destruction, and nothing to lose but some questionable dignity in defeat... Lexi Lane!

Let's forget honor! Forge Lexi's path through the horde of mindless humans and aliens with flames, fire, tire marks, and a whole bunch of bullets, missiles, and other mishandled and often misappropriated alien weaponry.

You're in for a wild ride of mayhem and machine guns. You got enough firepower to make the bravest hero blush; a cute anime girl who's got a date with final destiny; and a gas-guzzling, 900-horsepower beast of a modified sports car that's armed to the teeth and a tank full of fuel, and a driver seat full of fury!

  • Short rounds of play for quick pick-up and play styles, or just killing some time (and aliens) during a break.
  • Start with your basic bullet bursting ballistics and upgrade your weapons and arsenal throughout each round.
  • Upgrade your ride of sweet slaughter to suit your gameplay... do you want to be a high-octane glass cannon, a Sunday driving shooter, or something else?
  • Jam out to the jingles... what's a little death and destruction without some rocking tunes to accompany the rocket fire?
  • Drive through hordes of mind-controlled humans, leaving their salt, tears, and dreams in puddles of blood and guts.
  • Cute anime protagonist.

At this point...what's not to like?

item.title: The Monster War
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to The Monster War, where three distinct gaming experiences unite to deliver unparalleled excitement and challenge! A game that brings to life the heroic exploits of Lyonel Cooper, a valiant knight from the pages of "A Tale of Destiny". Play as our hero on a heroic quest to safeguard the kingdom from a relentless onslaught of monstrous invaders.

In Tower Defense mode, stand firm against waves of enemies as you fortify the castle's defenses and thwart the advancing horde of goblins, orcs and trolls. Every victory propels you forward into the heart of the conflict, but failure means certain defeat.

Transition seamlessly to Side Scroller mode upon triumph, immersing yourself in a captivating adventure across diverse landscapes teeming with danger. Push back the monstrous threat with skillful combat and exploration, but beware‚Äîa single misstep could leave you out of time and send you back to the front lines of Tower Defense.

Finally, engage your strategic prowess in Casual Puzzle mode, where the fate of the kingdom hangs in the balance. Disrupt enemy operations by strategically launching catapults and dismantling their bases piece by piece. Failure here will bring you back to the Side Scroller mode, requiring you to locate their nearest stronghold again. Three successful assaults on monster strongholds are what is required to triumph and bring an end to the war.

A passion project crafted by a solo developer with a love for storytelling, The Monster War combines innovative gameplay mechanics with stunning visuals, and all created within a limited timeframe using free assets. Every aspect of this game reflects a labor of love, inviting players to immerse themselves in a thrilling saga of bravery, strategy, and triumph against all odds. It is my hope that you will enjoy the project for what it is and be able to see the vision and potential of what it could be.

Join the battle in The Monster War and become a part of this epic tale!

item.title: There's No Easter Eggs
item.description:
About This Game

There's No Easter eggs! Totally and absolutely! Actually, chocolate is bad for you so you definitely don't want to be looking for them eggs all around 9 unique maps!

There's No Easter eggs is a casual hidden object game with over 500 Easter eggs to find. Can you catch them all?

item.title: Deep Sleep: The Beggining
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Winderfield: The Forgotten Town!

Embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic disappearance of an entire community. Did the peaceful town of Winderfield truly exist, or was it merely a myth woven by the shadows of the government?

In Winderfield: The Forgotten Town, you'll dive into the legend surrounding this place, where it's said a demon lurks in dreams, trapping the unwary in a deep and terrifying slumber. Only those with the will and wit can solve the demon's cryptic puzzles and escape its clutches.

Relive the events of 1950 through the eyes of the sole survivor who managed to awaken from the slumber, confronting the chilling truth lurking behind Winderfield's apparent calmness. Will you unravel the hidden secrets in the shadows of this lost town?

Key Features:

Immerse yourself in an engaging narrative full of mystery and suspense.
Solve challenging puzzles to escape the demon haunting dreams.
Explore the dark corners of a forgotten town, teeming with secrets and dangers.
Discover the truth behind Winderfield's disappearance and the fate of its inhabitants.
Experience immersive gameplay with stunning graphics and an eerie atmosphere.
Get ready to push your mental limits and confront your worst nightmares in Winderfield: The Forgotten Town. Are you prepared to unearth the secrets buried in the heart of darkness?

item.title: Metaball
item.description:
About This Game




Metaball is a free-to-play, crossplay-enabled online multiplayer sports game that combines fast-paced movements, thrilling PvP matches, and advanced team play.
You play as a Rider, trying to bring fame and wealth to his name by winning merciless Metaball League games with his teammates and collecting Metanium and MVP points.



Hop on your hoverboard, grab the ball with your chain, and use its swinging power to perform diverse actions.
Dunk, shoot, block, and steal the ball while using the nitro to boost your speed or perform double or triple jumps!



Play versus other Riders in different game modes such as quick match, tournament, or private match!



After each match, you will receive MVP points depending on the result. So make sure to win and to be the best Rider to receive a bonus!
The more you have MVP points, the more you will unlock rewards!



With your hard-earned Metanium and MVP points, progress in the Metapass, and try to collect your favorite pieces of equipment and items to use in the game!

Items shown may require separate purchases from the in-game store and are subject to availability. Contains in-game purchases.

item.title: Eldgear
item.description:
About This Game

Eldgear is a tactical strategy RPG set in a fantasy world.

In the vast unexplored land of Argenia where hundreds of nations are crowded together, a new era is about to begin, leaving behind the medieval era and entering the era of magical civilization.



In turn-based battles, you can choose your own strategy, whether you dash alone like lightning, advance steadily like the earth. Immersive and enjoyable pixel animations take place to enhance the battle experience.



Master area attacks that blow away enemies in a group, combined attacks unleashed by well-coordinated tags, and use EMA (Embedding Abilities) and EXA (Expanding Abilities)! Powerful strikes will power up into super special moves.

item.title: End Of Legends
item.description:
About This Game



Overview


"End Of Legends" is a blend of roguelike deck-building and auto battler mechanics. Assume the mantle of a forsaken Dark Lord, rising from the shadows to exact retribution upon humanity for its transgressions. Harness the dark arts to cast devastating spells, summon malevolent minions, and dismantle those who dared cross you. As you navigate through this merciless world, your strategic prowess will be the key to your dominion or downfall.



Featuring:


  • Dynamic upgrades that evolve your gameplay, ensuring each battle is filled with new strategies and outcomes.
  • Unique storytelling through grimoire cards, revealing the Dark Lord's past and influencing your abilities with crucial choices.
  • Epic battles against thousands of enemies, challenging your tactics and the might of your summoned armies.
  • Grand spells that unleash catastrophic destruction, turning the tide of combat with awe-inspiring power.




Cruel world:


An array of unique enemies and bosses, each presenting their own deadly arsenals and minions to test your cunning and resolve.
In "End Of Legends," the world teeters on the brink of despair, its fate intertwined with the whims of a figure shrouded in vengeance. Each grimoire card unveils a piece of the past, a story of betrayal, and a path to power untold. Your decisions within these memories forge your legacy, offering unparalleled power or unforeseen consequences. Will you reclaim your lost honor and rewrite the annals of history, or will you plunge the world further into darkness? The choice is yours, Dark Lord.

item.title: Go Go Zombies
item.description:
About This Game

Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!

First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!

Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack any nearby enemies automatically.

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and trippy audio visualizations. These effects can be toggled on or off from the SETTINGS menu or the PAUSE menu at any time.

Slammin' soundtrack includes The Gobs, Citric Dummies, GEE TEE, Thee Windom Earles, Redshift, Dope Sweater, Checkpoint, BEEF, Prison Affair, The Zombie Dandies, Voodoo Puppets, Untimely Dosage, Sovran, The Hydeouts, Punk Rock Opera, Sept, No Brains, Safety Pins, Bass Feens, Hawt Denim, Los Pecadores, Vampire Death, and more!

item.title: Ancient Weapon Holly
item.description:
About This Game



Holly, a humanoid weapon sealed deep within a labyrinth due to its potential to cause humanity's downfall, swears vengeance upon humans after awakening from a slumber that spanned thousands of years.

Experience a tense roguelike action game where you protect the source of your stolen power, the altar. Destroy gates that block your way and aim to clear stages. Use the magic stones you acquire to evolve Holly and expand the altar to deepen your strategies.



Game Settings
Long ago, when humans were still developing advanced civilizations, a war engulfed the world.

Among the multitude of weapons created, an autonomous weapon resembling a young girl was completed. Her arms could crack the earth like a whip, demolish any building in her path, and her red eyes mercilessly killed people one after another.

This girl was named 'Holly' by the people, and due to her overwhelming power, she was sealed deep within the earth.

After tens of thousands of years, the only emotion Holly felt upon awakening from her slumber in the dark magic ruins was an insurmountable hatred for humans.

"Humanity, perish."

Even though her weapon functions have degraded and she can now only slightly damage the ground or walls, Holly's vendetta against the world above has just begun.

Features of Ancient Weapon Holly
1. Intense combat.
2. Strategic gameplay that lures enemies into pitfalls.
3. Exhilarating action of burying enemies you've trapped in pitfalls.
4. Holly's evolution and unlocking altar functions lead to deeper strategies.

Intense Combat

In the dungeons, a moment's hesitation can be deadly.
Breath-taking, intense combat awaits you.
Face enemies with overwhelming strength and seize the fleeting moments of opportunity for strategic battles.

Strategically Lure Enemies into Pitfalls

Break the ground and block the enemy's path.
This is your way to survive.
Predict the enemy's movements, create pitfalls, and capture them all.
Strategic foresight, rather than straightforward combat, is essential in this game.

Exhilarating Action of Burying Enemies in Pitfalls

Lure enemies into pitfalls and bury them with your own hands.
The thrill of this moment is one of the game's main attractions.

Deepen Strategy with Holly's Evolution and Altar Unlocking

Defeat enemies to acquire enhancement items.
Use these items to evolve Holly and unlock the altar's functions!
Experience a deepening of strategies as you play.
With a skill tree format, a variety of enhancements are possible based on your strategy.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Character Creator & Storage
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare for your grand adventure, Arisen!

In this app, you can create your characters for Dragon's Dogma 2. Customize the looks of your main character, the Arisen, and the looks and inclination of your companion, your Main Pawn. You can store up to 5 characters of each, the Arisen and your Main Pawn respectively.

The character data created in this app can be transferred to the base game of Dragon's Dogma 2, available separately.

In the main game there will be additional graphic options available.

item.title: Stars Survivor
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for an epic gaming experience with Stars Survivor, the ultimate multiplayer space combat game ! üéÆ Dive into a thrilling intergalactic universe where you must compete for survival and glory. Engage in intense and breathtaking space battles against players from around the world, and prove your dominance in a variety of exciting game modes. üí•üåå

Exciting Game Modes:

üåü Battle Royale: Be the last survivor to claim victory! üí™ Take on other pilots in a fierce competition where strategy and skill are crucial to triumph. ü•á

‚öîÔ∏è DeathMatch: Showcase your piloting prowess and prove your worth by achieving the highest number of kills. Be swift, precise, and unstoppable to become the top space fighter. üí£üöÄ

‚öΩ Stars Ball: Unite your piloting skills in a unique football game with spaceships. Score incredible goals and lead your team to victory! ‚öΩü•Ö

ü§∫ Duel: Demonstrate your individual power by facing off against opponents in thrilling 1v1 duels. Outmatch your adversaries by winning as many showdowns as possible. üî™üõ∏

Global Ranking System:
In Battle Royale mode, put your skills to the test in competitive ranked matches. Climb the divisions and leagues to rank among the best pilots in the universe! Your rank will be proudly displayed in the global leaderboard. üèÜüåç

Customization and Progression:
Earn XP by winning battles and unlock a variety of unique items in the Space Pass, our exclusive battle pass. Customize your spaceships with lasers, thrusters, and much more! üîßüöÄ

In-Game Currency - Planetary:
Earn Planetary by playing and completing challenges. Use them to purchase cosmetic items, upgrades, and special equipment from the daily store. üí∞üí´

Strategy and Tactical Bonuses:
Explore different planets on the map and destroy them to collect bonuses like missiles, speed boosts, static mines, repair packs, and more. Use them wisely to gain an edge over your opponents in space combat. üí•üõ†Ô∏è

Play with Friends:
Invite your friends to join you in this space adventure. Team up or engage in friendly duels to determine who's the top space pilot! ü§ùüöÄ

Download Stars Survivor for free now and embark on an unparalleled intergalactic gaming journey! Let the battle for survival and glory begin! üöÄüåå

(Include captivating screenshots and a stunning trailer to captivate potential players. Highlight unique features such as diverse game modes, the ranking system, and tactical bonuses.)

Note: In-app purchases are available for players looking to acquire Planetary more quickly and access exclusive items. üí∞üíé

item.title: The Czar is Dead
item.description:
About This Game

The game describes the events of an alternative history.
What would have happened if Great Russia had won the First World War?
The game has 7 endings depending on the player's decisions.
Approximate reading time for the entire novel is 3 hours.

item.title: Duelists of Eden
item.description:
About This Game


Duelists of Eden is a card-grid-fighting game set after the events of One Step From Eden. Build your custom deck and battle online in real-time action! There are over 14 unique characters with strengths and weaknesses to encourage creative spell combinations and synergies. Will you combo slashes, fire, or even use bombs to eliminate your competition?

Deckbuilding

Fight in a mix of strategy and real-time action! Create your own unique combination of spells to take down the competition.
Save and edit an unlimited amount of decks in the editor!

Dynamic cardtridge and combo system

Create combos on the fly, adapting the scenario and what spells you and your opponent have.

Tutorial and training mode

Learn the ropes in the tutorial mode and deep dive into the mechanics via training mode.
Training mode includes hitboxes, character states, quick deck edits, speed modifiers, and more!

Custom rollback netcode

The game was completely rebuilt to support custom rollback netcode, for the smoothest experience possible.

Replay mode

Review your matches in replay mode!



Local multiplayer may require a controller.

item.title: The Creature Zone VR: Welcome To Dystopia
item.description:
About This Game

Not All Places End in Utopia...


In This FPS Horror Physics VR Game Set In The Fictional City "Rapid Lakes, Michigan", You Play As David Skymanski, A Creature Zone Department Of Science Officer. When You Start To Realize How Damaging The Creature Zone Is, You Decide To Finally End The Dictatorship Ran By James DiSonte. While You Try To Start An Uprising, It Turns Out That The Demonic Soul Which Inhabited The Terry's Pizzeria Terry Animatronic Back In Fayville Before It Was Nuked, Are Now In Captivity By The Creature Zone. What Will You Accomplish? What Chaos Will Ensue? And What Choices Will You Make? Play For Free To Find Out!

Key Features
  • Realistic Physics With Good Arms
  • Physics-Based Climbing With Realistic Feet placement
  • NPCs That Can Get Killed
  • Physics-Based Guns
And Much More!

WARNING:

This Game Has Flashing Lights, Swearing, Scares, And Blood, So Be Careful. This Game Can Also Cause Motion Sickness, So Also Beware Of This.

item.title: Dungeon Keeper Gold‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

Being the Dungeon Keeper and all, this is your home, too. And it‚Äôs your business to take these loathsome creatures of darkness and hone them into screaming, frothing, clawing forces of destruction. Lure them in with food and the promise of dank and fetid places to sleep. Keep them in line with the back of your hand and the threat of dire consequences. Pit their scaly hides against the best that the Forces of Good can muster, and they‚Äôll die for you as they rip steaming entrails out of the hapless heroes.

It‚Äôs a degenerate and nasty job‚Ä¶and you love it. Yes, home is where your heart is. In a box. Packed in salt. That's right ‚Äî Dungeon Keeper, Bullfrog's classic dungeon management strategy, gives you no extra credit for having any morals. After all, the underworld isn't black and white!

Key features:

  • Revolutionary game packed with tons of dark humor, an impressive variety of hellish creatures, and highly addictive gameplay
  • Build your dungeon & protect it with a labyrinth of dark corridors, a web of deadly traps, an arsenal of powerful spells, and an army of bloodthirsty demons
  • A refreshing title for someone tired of rescuing princesses, saving worlds, and all that love, happiness, and political correctness junk. Just this once, be the bad guy!

item.title: Command & Conquer Red Alert‚Ñ¢ 2 and Yuri‚Äôs Revenge‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

The world erupts in conflict as Soviet forces invade American soil in Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2. You are the Supreme Commander. Arm yourself to the teeth with top-secret technologies and lead the Soviet or Allied troops to victory.

Plus, defeat an army of mind-controlled Soviet forces in the expansion Command & Conquer: Yuri's Revenge.

Game Features:

  • Many ways to play - Lead Soviet or Allied forces in a gripping single-player game or a Skirmish game, where there's no particular objective other than destroying everything else on-screen. Who will win the war for world domination?

  • No need to play nice - You'll need to pull out all the stops if you're going to win this war. Thankfully, you've got a well-stocked arsenal of legitimate and illicit technologies from Prism Tanks and Terror Drones, to Psychic Mind Control devices and Cloning Vats. Use them.

  • Deliver the fury - Dominate land, air, and sea battles with the help of over 80 units and structures. Plus, you'll benefit from a enhanced veterancy system that turns new forces into battle-hardened war machines -- and brings you closer to victory.

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Generals Zero Hour
item.description:
About This Game

Command & Conquer Generals Zero Hour brings you closer to the enemy than ever before. Engage opposing forces at hot spots around the globe as you match strategies and arsenals against the new masterminds of modern war.

Arsenal. Unleash the next generation of 3D new units and 20 new upgrades including China's ECM Tank, GLA's BattleBus and the USA's Spectre Gunship.

Missions. Take on 15 new missions and make tomorrow's headlines. Root out a splinter cell in Cairo, steal deadly toxins from a U.S. lab and more.

Generals. Match strategies and arsenals against 9 enemy commanders with unpredictable personalities and tactics.

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Tiberian Sun‚Ñ¢ and Firestorm‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

The Second Tiberium War begins in this legendary sequel to the original Command & Conquer.

With his forces stronger than ever, arch villain and leader of The Brotherhood of Nod - Kane - is pitched in an epic battle against the world's war machine - the Global Defense Initiative. Now you must orchestrate the fate of mankind.

  • Fight on Dynamic Battlefields. Nature itself provides tactical opportunities - destroyable and deformable terrain, forest fires, treacherous ice fields and many more surprises that help or hinder your strategies.
  • Exciting New Strategies and Units. Jump Jet Infantry, Hover Tanks, Tunneling APCs, Hunter Seekers, Laser Fences, Mechanized Battle Units and many more.
  • The "Veterancy" Factor. Units can become faster and stronger as they gain combat experience.
  • New Kinetic Battlefields. Flying shrapnel, shock waves and crashing debris are just a few of the exciting new technologies developed to enhance the in-game experience.
  • The mood and attitude of the battlefield comes alive like never before - covert night missions, searchlights and new defenses intensify the thrill and excitement.

Then take the battle further in Firestorm, the official expansion pack for the game. Includes all-new campaign missions, cinematics, and units to decide the future of mankind.

item.title: Command & Conquer Renegade‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

Command & Conquer gets up close and personal in this classic First Person Shooter for one of the most iconic franchises.

  • Wreak Havoc - Experience the Command & Conquer universe on foot as Havoc, wise-cracking GDI Commando.
  • Make Your Own Rules - Take on the evil Brotherhood of Nod using your own mix of brute force, stealth, and strategy.
  • Assault at Ground Level - Dish out the damage in either first or third person.
  • Total Access - Sneak inside and explore full-scale structures, like immense Tiberium Refineries and the ominous Hand of Nod.
  • Grind the Gears - Beef up your arsenal by commandeering lethal vehicles, such as Nod Buggies, Flame Tanks, and Mammoth Tanks.
  • Weapons of Mass Destruction - Choose from a multitude of weapons, including the Tiberium Auto Rifle, Chemical Sprayer, and the devasting Personal Ion Cannon.

item.title: Gas Gas Rocket!
item.description:
About This Game

Gas Gas Rocket! is an action-packed game that puts you in control of a rocket hurtling through space on an unusual and dangerous route. In this game, you'll need to focus all your attention on driving the rocket while avoiding obstacles that can suddenly appear from anywhere. The rocket has no brakes, which means you'll need to use all your skill and reflexes to navigate it safely through the treacherous space route. Your mission is to pilot the rocket as far as possible without crashing into any obstacles. As you progress through the game, the challenges will become increasingly difficult, requiring quick reflexes and precise timing.
So, if you're ready for an adrenaline-fueled space adventure, then hop on board the Gas Gas Rocket! and blast off into the new world!

Game features:
  • 21 different rockets
  • Collecting special skills ( magnet, speed and resistance)
  • Daily reward

item.title: Fight till the End!
item.description:
About This Game

Fight Till the End! is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a courageous character who finds themselves trapped in a deadly game of life and death. As a prisoner, your only chance at survival is to participate in a series of dangerous contests and defeat all opponents to ultimately destroy the boss and secure your freedom. With every move you make, you must think carefully and act quickly because there is no going back. The game's final boss is the ultimate challenge, requiring all of your skills and strategies to defeat. Only the strongest and most strategic players will emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to survive the game and emerge as the ultimate champion? Play now and find out!

Game features:
  • Limited time
  • 3 lives for survival
  • Competitions between life and death

item.title: Plant Gallery: A Short Botanic Experience
item.description:
About This Game

This is a short game about a gallery with plants. In order to complete the game, you will need to find keys, open chests and connect the right name tags to the right paintings.

Duration of the game is aproximately 15-30 minutes.

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Generals
item.description:
About This Game

Command & Conquer Generals puts your trigger finger on the pulse of modern warfare. Prepare your forces General... it's time to engage in the next generation of real-time strategy.

Command. Wage real-time war in more ways than ever with a modern and near-future arsenal. Command the powerful U.S. forces, the vast Chinese war machine, or the resourceful Global Liberation Army.

Conquer. Battle it out in unprecedented detail on full 3D environments. All-new units and tactics with maximum destructive capability, including Aurora Strike Bombers, Dragon Tanks, and much more.

item.title: Dungeon Keeper‚Ñ¢ 2
item.description:
About This Game

Discover your dark side as you build an evil underground kingdom and defend it against the forces of good. Carve out a living, breathing world and attract a host of devilish creatures to swell the ranks of your dark hordes. Form an alliance with the Horned Reaper to expand your empire and invade the realms above. In this dungeon-building, treasure-defending, hero-destroying adventure, it feels good to be bad ‚Äî and the badder, the better!

Key features:

  • Get your hands on even more evil tools. Use everything at your disposal ‚Äî torture devices included ‚Äî to create the deadliest dungeon imaginable. Set traps, send dastardly demons to do your bidding, and unleash the powers of the underworld with a brand-new magic system.
  • Rule your way. Keep your minions well-supplied with bustling infrastructure and good pay, or scare them into miserable servitude. There‚Äôs no extra credit for good behavior.
  • Bring your friends to their knees. Play with up to 4 frenemies, and prove who‚Äôs the most ruthless dungeon keeper in all land.

item.title: Command & Conquer Red Alert‚Ñ¢, Counterstrike‚Ñ¢ and The Aftermath‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

Command & Conquer Red Alert pushed the envelope for the RTS genre in the mid-1990s and became one of the most iconic strategy games of all time.

Command & Conquer: Red Alert gives you the opportunity to be more devious, cunning, and ruthless than ever before. Red Alert puts the fate of the world in your hands!

Counterstrike, the exciting expansion pack to Red Alert, is full of clandestine activity, experimental technologies, and disavowed tactics. Includes 16 all-new missions, where you decide the ultimate fate of the struggle between the Allies and Soviets.

In The Aftermath expansion pack, prepare for guerilla tactics, insidious strategies, and forbidden weapons. Includes 18 all-new missions and multiple units in a showdown that will test your mettle.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description:
About This Game



Between the Stars is a space action game with RPG growth and real time combat that places you at the helm of an interstellar cruiser. Your mission will be to protect the civilized world from the Children of the Sun, a faction that dominates border planets in the known universe. In order to undertake your mission you must cross the galaxy, face new challenges at each warp jump, and make difficult decisions that affect your ship, crew and the world that surrounds you while upgrading your ship's equipment and fighting in battles to survive.


  • Fight in intense space battles in real time.
  • Use special abilities on your ship at the right moment to make a difference on the battlefield.


  • Unlock, upgrade, personalize and buy different playable ships and their systems in order to conquer the galaxy.
  • Create a captain and develop them throughout the adventure. Level them up and acquire different attributes depending on your decisions.
  • Explore the stellar map and its events generated in a procedural universe.


  • Visit space stations and planets across different sectors that make up the galaxy.
  • Hire and upgrade your crew in order to face the dangers of the universe. Ensure their safety and cover your casualties, as well as level them up.


  • Hundreds of text based events that will pit your capacity as well as your crews against countless dangers.
  • Craft, salvage, and investigate new weaponry in order to augment your offensive capabilities.
  • Decisions made in one event could change the evolution of the entire playthrough.
  • Enjoy a standard difficulty mode or play with permadeath on for a challenge.

item.title: Sim City 3000‚Ñ¢ Unlimited
item.description:
About This Game

Create and control your urban empire with more power than ever before. With SimCity 3000 Unlimited, you get all the great features of the original SimCity 3000 plus much more. Expand your SimCities with 2 new building sets from Asia and Europe. Take on 13 challenging scenarios, or create your own. Unleash 4 new disasters, including an unforgiving whirlpool and plummeting space junk. This is truly SimCity without limits!

Key features:
  • Re-create cities from around the globe with hundreds of new buildings.
  • Reunify East and West Berlin in one of 13 scenarios.
  • Spruce up your city with over 95 world landmarks.
  • Protect your citizens from 4 new disasters.
  • Select hundreds of buildings from SimCity 3000 and all-new Asian and European buildings.
  • Create unique masterpieces for your metropolis with the Building Architect Plus tool.
  • Inflict 9 disasters, including toxic clouds, plague of locusts, space junk, and a whirlpool.
  • Play 13 challenging scenarios, or make your own with the SimCity Scenario Creator.

item.title: Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri‚Ñ¢ Planetary Pack
item.description:
About This Game

Mankind begins its most monumental task: the colonization of space. A crew of internationally renowned scientists and security strategists, with wide-ranging convictions and diverse ethics, embarks on a mission that will change the world. One Planet. Seven unique factions. Which will you lead? Each faction has its own agenda, each leader a final goal. You must play to each strength and exploit each hidden weakness in your quest to rule the future.

Key features:

  • Great spin-off of the legendary Civilization series, in a refreshing sci-fi setting
  • Design your own units. Balance their speed, power, and toughness to suit your current tactical needs
  • Seven factions to chose from, each with its own artificial intelligence model that creates a very suggestive feeling that you‚Äôre up against real people

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ and The Covert Operations‚Ñ¢
item.description:
About This Game

The legendary RTS game which started it all. Will you side with the humanistic GDI or bring the world to its knees with Kane and the Brotherhood of Nod. Your adversaries are without mercy. And so are you.

Includes the The Covert Operations expansion pack with a range of challenging new missions.

item.title: A Twisted Tale
item.description:
About This Game

About the game


Discover a humouristic point and click adventure inspired by all the masterpieces which made us stick to our computers back in the day (and therefore we played outside way too infrequently). Full of loony characters, unexpected twists and challenging riddles.
Accompany Vio on her unintentional journey through various realms. Explore broken cities, pirate ships in the deepest jungle and other unreal places. Stand by her side when she makes the acquaintance of the (depressive) Death and engage with lots of explicit and ambiguous references, hommages and imitations of the big classics past (and not quite past) times.




Meet quirky characters with Vio and discover a world that doesn't seem to have much in common with our own.




The heart beats for retro! That's why the solo developer draws all the background graphics the old-fashioned way with paper, pencil and ink. They are then coloured digitally. All animations are hand-drawn in the classic frame-by-frame style.




A Twisted Tale extends over a total of 7 chapters. Each chapter takes Vio into a new world with its own setting, small stories and a large portion of classic point & click adventure riddles. The first chapter, which can be discovered with the release of the game, has an average playing time of 6 - 8 hours. All further chapters will take at least this amount of time and will be released as DLC.

Key features


  • Hand-drawn traditionally and digitally created graphics in 4K/Ultra HD
  • Classic frame by frame animation
  • 1-click interface
  • Female main character
  • An undead deuteragonist (depressive Death)
  • Lots of explicit and ambiguous references, hommages and imitations of the big classics
  • Even more comical, thrilling and unique characters
  • Weird humor and retro-vibes
  • Varying worlds and twisted settings
  • Extensive story and classical complex riddles
  • Decisions affecting the game
  • Alternative endings
